nodes.text: The Reconciliation Project was a project undertaken by the New Republic following the end of the Galactic Civil War and the defeat of the Galactic Empire at the Battle of Jakku. The project was led by a director; its members included Senator Wyl Lark, while the project had an ongoing effort to find volunteers. Six years after the end of the war, a survivor of the Empire's destruction of Nacronis reached out to the project, and Lark arranged her to speak with former TIE pilot Yrica Quell, who had deserted the Empire after participating in the destruction.
